description: A survey finds almost half of Isle of Man parents were unhappy with the provision of online education.
title: Quality of Isle of Man lockdown lessons divides parent opinion
title_page: Quality of Isle of Man lockdown lessons divides parent opinion - BBC News
maintext: By contrast to the views of parents, 91% of DESC staff were either very satisfied or extremely satisfied with the volume of lessons, and 87% said the same about the quality of the learning.
